declarations.name: ON_COOKIE_BANNER_ACCEPT_ALL
declarations.description: Event name for when all cookies are accepted.

declarations.name: ON_COOKIE_BANNER_NECESSARY_ONLY
declarations.description: Event name for when all only necessary cookies are accepted.

declarations.name: ON_COOKIE_BANNER_MANAGE_PREFS
declarations.description: Event name for when a user clicks manage preferences.

declarations.name: ON_COOKIE_BANNER_PREFS_SAVED
declarations.description: Event name for when a user clicks save preferences.

declarations.name: preferences

members.name: _customTagEnhancers
members.default:
{
        linkStatement: (tagContent: string) => html`<pie-link href="${this._localiseText('banner.links.cookieStatement')}" variant="inverse" target="_blank">${tagContent}</pie-link>`,
        linkNecessaryOnly: (tagContent: string) => html`<pie-link data-test-id="body-necessary-only" tag="button" variant="inverse" @click="${this._onNecessaryOnly}">${tagContent}</pie-link>`,
        linkManagePreferences: (tagContent: string) => html`<pie-link data-test-id="body-manage-prefs" tag="button" variant="inverse" @click="${this._openManagePreferencesModal}">${tagContent}</pie-link>`,
        linkAcceptAll: (tagContent: string) => html`<pie-link data-test-id="body-accept-all" tag="button" variant="inverse" @click="${this._onAcceptAll}">${tagContent}</pie-link>`,
        linkCookieStatement: (tagContent: string) => html`<pie-link href="${this._localiseText('banner.links.cookieStatement')}" size="small" target="_blank">${tagContent}</pie-link>`,
        linkCookieTechList: (tagContent: string) => html`<pie-link href="${this._localiseText('banner.links.cookieTechnologies')}" size="small" target="_blank">${tagContent}</pie-link>`,
    }

members.name: _displayCookieBanner
members.description:
Handles closing the modal and re-displaying the cookie banner
and making the cookie banner visible

members.name: _handlePreferencesSaved
members.description:
Handles saving the user cookie preferences, closing the modal and the cookie banner
Creates a state object for the save event, indicating the checked status
of each preference except for the `all` preference.

members.name: _dispatchCookieBannerCustomEvent
members.description:
Note: We should aim to have a shareable event helper system to allow
us to share this across components in-future.

Dispatch a custom event.

To be used whenever we have behavioral events we want to
bubble up through the cookie banner.

members.name: _onNecessaryOnly
members.description: Hides the cookie banner and emits the necessary only event

members.name: _onAcceptAll
members.description: Hides the cookie banner and emits the accept all event

members.name: _openManagePreferencesModal
members.description: Opens the manage preferences modal and emits an event letting users know

members.name: _handleSwitchStates
members.description:
Handles the logic of the switch nodes (preferences).
Clicking the “all” switch should turn on all preferences.
When the “all” switch is checked, and one of the other preferences is clicked,
then the “all” switch should be unchecked.
if all switches are checked, the `all` switch should
be turned on automatically

members.name: renderPreference
members.description: Renders the content of the preference item.

events.description: when all only necessary cookies are accepted.
events.name: pie-cookie-banner-necessary-only

events.description: when a user clicks manage preferences.
events.name: pie-cookie-banner-manage-prefs

events.description: when a user clicks save preferences.
events.name: pie-cookie-banner-prefs-saved

declarations.name: localiseText

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: path to the key in the locale object

declarations.description:
Localises a plain text string
If the key is not found, it will be used as fallback

declarations.name: localiseRichText

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: path to the key in the locale object

parameters.name: customTagEnhancers
parameters.description: object containing the custom tag names and their respective enhancer functions

declarations.description:
Localises a rich text string by replacing custom tags with their respective enhancer functions content
If the key is not found, it will be used as fallback
